00366         PlaceHolderTid

00380         Uint16 recordLength;

00391     struct SlotPageHeader {
00393         DbjPage::PageHeader pageHeader; 
00395         Uint16 freeSpace;
00397         Uint16 consecFreeSpace;
00399         Uint16 consecFreeSpaceOffset;
00401         Uint8 numberOfSlots;
00403         Slot recordSlot[1];
00404     };
00405 
00407     static const Uint8 MAX_SLOTS = DBJ_MAX_UINT8;
00408 
00418     static const Uint16 FSI_BLOCK_SIZE = (
00419             ((DBJ_PAGE_SIZE - sizeof(SlotPageHeader) + sizeof(Slot)) %
00420                     DBJ_MAX_UINT8) == 0 ?
00421             ((DBJ_PAGE_SIZE - sizeof(SlotPageHeader) + sizeof(Slot)) /
00422                     DBJ_MAX_UINT8) :
00423             ((DBJ_PAGE_SIZE - sizeof(SlotPageHeader) + sizeof(Slot)) /
00424                     DBJ_MAX_UINT8) + 1);
00425 
00439     struct FsiEntry {
00442         Uint8 freeSpace;
00445         Uint8 freeSpaceBlock;
00446 
00448         FsiEntry() : freeSpace(0), freeSpaceBlock(0) { }
00449 
00451         FsiEntry &operator=(const FsiEntry &other)
00452               {
00453                   freeSpace = other.freeSpace;
00454                   freeSpaceBlock = other.freeSpaceBlock;
00455                   return *this;
00456               }
00457     };
00458 
00465     static const Uint32 MAX_FSI_ENTRIES = (DBJ_PAGE_SIZE - sizeof(Uint16) -
00466             sizeof(DbjPage::PageHeader)) / sizeof(FsiEntry);
00467 
00481     struct FsiPage {
00483         DbjPage::PageHeader pageHeader; 
00486         Uint16 countEntries;
00488         FsiEntry pageInfo[MAX_FSI_ENTRIES];
00489     };
00490 
00501     inline const PageId getFsiPageId(const PageId pageId) const
00502           { return (pageId / (MAX_FSI_ENTRIES+1)) * (MAX_FSI_ENTRIES+1); }
00503 
00512     inline const Uint32 getFsiSlot(const PageId pageId) const
00513           { return pageId - getFsiPageId(pageId) - 1; }
00514 
00527     inline void markNotExists(FsiEntry &fsiEntry) const
00528           {
00529               fsiEntry.freeSpace = 0;
00530               fsiEntry.freeSpaceBlock =
00531                   (DBJ_PAGE_SIZE - sizeof(SlotPageHeader)) / FSI_BLOCK_SIZE;
00532           }
00533 
00545     inline void markEmptyPage(FsiEntry &fsiEntry) const
00546           {
00547               fsiEntry.freeSpace =
00548                   (DBJ_PAGE_SIZE - sizeof(SlotPageHeader)) / FSI_BLOCK_SIZE;
00549               fsiEntry.freeSpaceBlock =
00550                   (DBJ_PAGE_SIZE - sizeof(SlotPageHeader)) / FSI_BLOCK_SIZE;
00551           }
00552 
00568     inline const bool pageAlreadyExists(FsiEntry &fsiEntry) const
00569           { return fsiEntry.freeSpace >= fsiEntry.freeSpaceBlock; }

00847   public:
00868     static inline int compareSlotsByOffset(const void *s1, const void *s2)
00869           {
00870               const Slot *slot1 = static_cast<const Slot *>(s1);
00871               const Slot *slot2 = static_cast<const Slot *>(s2);
00872               return slot1->offset < slot2->offset ? -1 : +1;
00873           }
